name: Little Bear Chef
storyline: Albearto Honeybottle, better known as Chef Toto, is the main character of our game. He is small, and sometimes he cooks food. He likes reading and long walks by the beach.
summary: Little Bear Chef is a cozy 3D cooking platformer where you play as a tiny bear chef in a regular sized kitchen. It's all about coming up with creative and funny solutions to cook the recipe at hand.
